title: Feed, Tilt and Infamous Playing The Champion For The First Time
body:
Dear Riot Games, 
 
I have been playing this game for a while and to be honest I do not plan on quitting any time soon. As much I love this game, it has been hard for me to climb and have pleasant games because of other players. Now, I am not an expert and I do sometimes loose my focus and make bad decisions and calls, also I do understand having a bad day and playing the game to relax and forget about the outside world. However, even though I do not have a big problem with feeding and flaming because someone is having a bad day, I do have a problem with players feeding and flaming when they are playing a champion for the first time in ranked queues. 
Ranked games are supposed to be more serious, and I get it, it is only a game, but when you lose so many game because of a player deciding to pick a champion he never played in his life for the first time and then goes and feeds, now this is what bothers me.

I am writing this to offer a suggestion.

Have you ever considered somehow locking champions in ranked games? By this I mean, have you ever considered making a champion unplayable for a player if he or she did not spend some time playing that champion? I think, it would really be beneficial if you were to lock or make a champion unplayable in lower elo, (up to lets say Diamond III or even lower or higher I will let you think about that) if a player did not previously played the champion a few times(2 or 3, again this I live to you) in blind pick before playing that champion in ranked games. I have experienced myself and even saw other streamers complain how someone is playing poorly because he or she picked a champion for the first time in a ranked game. 

With this adjustment, I believe it will be easier to climb and more enjoyable playing ranked games because there will be no players or very few players that perform poorly because they do not know what to buy from the shop or spend time reading what their spells do. In order for a player to play a champion, he or she would have to go and play one or more games in blind or draft pick so they get to know their champion. This would not only help others climb but will benefit the player as well. Games would have less feeders and the percentage of a player undermining other player would be decreased, maybe for a small amount, but it will be a step towards more enjoyable and more competitive ranked games. 

Thank you for your patience and time, I hope I gave you something to think about. Much love and keep up the good work! 

Sincerely, proximo
